conbody.p: Title 10, U.S.C., Sections 235 and 2330a establish the requirement to report on manpower functions and costs under services contracts. Contractors were previously required to report on manpower to eCMRA; however, beginning with the FY20 reporting period (FY21 Q1) reporting will be done in SAM . FAR 4.1705 provides specifics on the data to be reported and applicable clauses.
HQ, United States Special Operations Command
Special Operations Forces Acquisition, Technology, and Logistics (SOF AT&L)
